page.title: 10TRADES_SHOPPING AND GARAGES
page.content: There is the BMW garage in Naburn whi_ ch sells motor bikes and they do them up if the paint's come off or if they have been in a crash.They also sell gear for the people who ride the motor bikes. They also have a small motor b_ ike for people to test.There is a mot_ er repairs shop in Acaster Malbis whe_ re they use junk cars that have been badly smashed up to mend other cars that have not been so badly damaged. Acaster Malbis has a Post Office and general stores and a caravan shop.The_ re is a Public House which sells food. In Naburn there is a post office and a reading room.They too have a public house which sells food.In Copmanthorpe there are eight shops.Most people in the three villages do their main shop_ ping in York.There is a garage in Cop_ manthorpe which sells and mends new and second hand cars.
